Soap dispenser as a planter: Use the dispenser to hold soil and small plants, creating a miniature garden.
Soap dispenser as a bird feeder: Fill the dispenser with birdseed and hang it outside to attract birds.
Soap dispenser as a birdhouse: Use the dispenser to create a small birdhouse by adding a roof and ventilation.
